definition: "fire" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 86), occurring in 熙, 然, 熊 etc
to fish (with line and hook)/to dupe
Diaoyu Islands, claimed by China but controlled by Japan as the Senkaku Islands, also called the Pinnacle Islands
Diaoyu Islands, located between Taiwan and Okinawa, controlled by Japan – which calls them the Senkaku Islands – but claimed by China as part of its territory
Pisces (constellation and sign of the zodiac)

sentences.english: The only time its okay to use your fingers is when it's a fish bone.
sentences.chinese: 只有在喫魚的時候，纔可以用手去捏魚骨頭。

sentences.english: The two fish of Pisces show Christianity's split between spirit and matter.
sentences.chinese: 雙魚宮的兩條魚表明基督教的靈性與物質的分離。

sentences.english: And a piranha 's a fish, just like your present.
sentences.chinese: 食人魚也是一種魚，就像你的生日禮物一樣。

sentences.english: Grandpa: To catch fish, you need the right magic.
sentences.chinese: 要釣到魚，你得有正確的魔法。

sentences.english: Pregnant mothers may also be concerned about eating fish because of the mercury content.
sentences.chinese: 準媽媽也對喫魚有顧慮，擔心其汞含量超標。

sentences.english: I've been sitting here for hours but the fish aren't biting.
sentences.chinese: 釣魚人等了好久，可是沒有魚上鉤。

sentences.english: Fish will die out of water.
Eating fish overall is greatly beneficial to your health, especially that of your brain.
sentences.chinese: 喫魚有益健康，特別是對您的大腦而言更是如此。

sentences.english: It can’t eat anymore, it is even difficult to move, and fish still swims in the lake.
sentences.chinese: 再也喫不下一條魚，甚至連走都走不動了。

sentences.english: The fish has also shown up late in the puffin's breeding season.
sentences.chinese: 在海雀繁殖季節，這種魚出現比較晚。

sentences.english: Thus I caught two fishes as it were with one hook.
sentences.chinese: 這樣我像是用一隻釣鉤而捉住了兩條魚。

sentences.english: I bread the fish before I cook it.
sentences.chinese: 我在烹調魚之前會先把它裹上面包粉。

sentences.english: If the fish sink to the bottom, add more salt to the water in the container.
sentences.chinese: 如果魚沉入水底，那麼在容器內的水中再加鹽。

sentences.english: Other people like fish, caged birds, tortoises and even snakes, monkeys or lions.
sentences.chinese: 另一些喜歡魚，鳥，龜甚至蛇，猴和獅子。

definition: to fish with a hook and bait
bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
enclosing frame made of bamboo, wire etc/cage/basket/steamer basket/to cover/to cage/to embrace/to manipulate through trickery
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
Leo (star sign)/Shihtzu township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
